Plintissa walked to the water and dived in, Dracona not following, she
didn't like the water as much...
----- Original Message -----
From: "Iron Raptor" <ironraptor13@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 1:00 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


>
>
> * The rage and need to tear something apart began to seep away as she saw
Zenyak detonate and then blow up, one threat to the Maximal forces now
something that would be a memory that wasn't ever worth remembering.
> Iron Raptor looked down at Prowl as he looked at her with concern, the
fact that she now felt the full pain of her wounds making it so that there
wouldn't have been a smile on her face if she would have tried.
> She then looked back to where the enemy had been but the sonic boom and so
on of the blase was now over and there was nothing but silence, the silent
oozing of her open side drawing more attention from her then the fact that
an enemy had been defeated.
> With a pained sigh she then stood as straight as she could without
snarling in pain and silently transformed into her robot mode, her steps a
bit wobbly and un certain as she took a step towards Prowl but then stopped.
Feeling a bit woozy from the loose of mech fluid and her systems not in the
best condition she decided to stop, tiredness and the loose of fluid adding
together to create a feeling like she was about to keel over.
> But then she looked over at Prowl with a very tired look on her face, the
fact that she had strained to keep her Second Beast Mode active and
withstand the damage she did causing this.
> But then she strained and straightened her posture as best she could,
doing a fairly poor job of hiding the pain she felt.
> But with an admired amount of effort she gave Prowl a slight/tired smile.*
>
> " I'm...fine. Just a few...scratches. Nothing big."
>
> * With that she then looked back over at Striker and Liono, it was time
that they got to that meeting that Liono had called earlier. Not to mention
that there was still the feud between Ramhorn and Plintissa to resolve.
> Iron Raptor knew that she was in no real condition to attend a meeting but
she had told Ramhorn and company that she would help solve his problem and
she wasn't about to let him down. The Maximals came before herself...always.
> With that look she then turned towards the base, the action causing her to
clench her teeth and force back a particularly loud snarl. But with
determination and a plain amount of force she then began to walk towards the
Ark...her progress slow and limping, the mech fluid from her side running
down her hip and leg but she tried to her best ability to ignore it.*
>
> " We best be getting to the...meeting before the bots left there...scrap
the place."
>
> * Her words were plain but pained, she just hoped that Prowl wouldn't rag
on her too much for not simply going to a CR chamber first.*
>
>
